articles.title: How AIDS vaccine research could help fight COVID-19 - CGTN
articles.description: Scientists in California explain how research into vaccines for snake bites and HIV could be the answer to the coronavirus pandemic.
articles.content:
The race is on to develop a COVID-19 vaccine from the blood of survivors. Scientists from around the world are working together to find an effective antibody against the virus that could also treat the diverse coronavirus family.

articles.title: Binge-Drinking Mice Able to Control Themselves After Scientists Tweaked Their Brains - Newsweek
articles.description: The rodents involved in a study went from drinking the equivalent of a glass of wine at dinner as opposed to a bottle, co-author J.R. Haun of the Medical University of South Carolina said.
articles.content:
Scientists who used a chemical to get mice to cut down on binge-drinking hope their research could one day help humans who struggle with alcohol problems.
